content.rendered:
An Unparalleled Love for her Craft

Zohara Shereen, termed the Best Makeup Artist in Bangalore is on a quest to make every woman look her best. Zohara Shereen’s cosmetics expertise has allowed her to deal with diverse and elite clients. Whether for a glossy photo shoot or a breathtaking wedding, she’s created looks that turn heads and are tailored to her customers’ every makeup request.

Our services are based in Bangalore and Dubai.

BOOK APPOINTMENT

"Everything was executed beautifully by Zohara Shereen and her team! Super professional and made my D-day a memorable one . Loved the make up"

Aishwarya
(Bridal Makeup Client)
About Zohara Shereen

Best Makeup Artist in Bangalore

She’s learned the ABCs of makeup from the finest of the best, including celebrity makeup artist Tamanna Roashan a.k.a dressyourface, and Russian beauty guru Goar Avetisyan.

 She was named “The Most Trusted Bridal Studio” at the International Excellence Awards in 2019 by Bollywood legend Kareena Kapoor Khan in appreciation of her contributions in the bridal beauty industry.

Zohara’ Shereen’s one real love is bridal transformations, even if her characteristic bold eye looks could adorn the front of any magazine! She’s dressed numerous women who want high-glam elegance on their special day, from vacation weddings to royal nuptials. Every bridal opportunity allows Zohara Shereen to show off her creative side while accentuating her brides’ innate beauty.

0 +

Year Experience

0 +

Happy Client

About Us
Our Services

Make Gorgeous Makeup A Part of Your Life.

Who wouldn’t desire an elegant and lavish destination wedding? For your destination wedding, we can transform you. We travel to wherever your destination wedding is to glam you up.                                                           

          Every time celebrities attend an event they must appear gorgeous. We can dress you up to such that you make everyone envious. No less are sports stars. They will need to look stunning because events are the only occasions when they can wear cosmetics. Making you feel special is our goal. Zohara Shereen has developed looks for a variety of events, from bridal festivities to editorial photoshoots, with over a decade of experience.  

All Services

Bridals

Whatever the bride wants, the bride gets! This is Zohara Shereen’s mantra for creating special bridal looks

Book Now

Pre Wedding

It’s a time to let your hair down and opt for something less traditional, and Zohara Shereen's knows just what each occasion demands.

Book Now

Party Make Up

Zohara Shereen's offers a simple party makeover and those looking for high-octane glamour, the glam party makeover package

Book Now

Celebrity and Commercial Photoshoot

Pre-wedding packages are inclusive of makeup, hairstyling and draping.

Book Now
Meet Your Makeup Artist

Zohara Shereen - Best Makeup Artist in Bangalore

Zohara Shereen has been working as a makeup artist for almost a decade.

Her charming personality, keen sense of colour, deft application, and basic yet elegant makeup styles won her a devoted following.

Many accolades have come Zohara Shereen’s way as a result of her signature services and obvious love for the industry.

My goals are to see the beauty in each person’s face.

Each of my clients has a distinct and personal style, which I believe should be reflected in their makeup.

To use only the best materials and procedures.

To deliver exceptional customer service.

Testimonial

What Our Customer Say

Omg! Zohra is a killer when it comes to make up. I just need to go for a wedding n see the bride to know that it’s Zohra’s work. She’s a perfectionist. I don’t think any of her brides have even an ounce of regret, they’re usually overwhelmed by her work. Goes without saying, I’m gonna definitely chose her for my D-day too. I guess the day We book our wedding halls is also the day we should be booking this gorgeous lady as she’s mostly packed for the awesome job she does. She’s won awards for her work as well. So guys, Undoubtedly Zohra is the best.

Sakeena Minhaj

Zohra sheereen is one of the most fine makeup artist in town!! She made me look beautiful and gorgeous Made my wedding a dream I couldn't imagine looking this way with any other makeup artist!! Zohra sheereen is one best !! I wouldn't refer to anyone else after she's made my day so special!! Love you Zohra❤️❤️❤️❤️

Anabia Sheriff

Had always dreamt about being dolled up by Zohara and got a chance to be dressed up by her for my engagement, and she did the most fabulous job! She made me look so so gorgeous on my important day, and I couldn’t trust anybody else with it! One can blindly leave it up to her to create the most amazing look. Thankyou, Zohara ♥️

Nuhi Kulsum

Follow Our Instagram

@zoharashereenmakeup_academy
